title: Becel® Garlic and Parsley Mashed Potatoes

instructions.1: In medium saucepan, add potatoes and cover with water. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes or until potatoes are very tender; drain.
instructions.2: In same saucepan, melt Becel® Buttery Taste margarine over medium heat and cook garlic, stirring, 1 minute or until fragrant.
instructions.3: Return potatoes to saucepan; mash. Stir in remaining ingredients.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the potatoes from Step 1 being used?
Is saucepan from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is saucepan from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is potatoes from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is potatoes from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 1?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the saucepan in Step 2?
Can we add (Step 1) and return (Step 3) at the same time?
